players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I think Bob is the mafia. He’s the only one left after Diana died and he’s acting suspicious. Let’s vote him out."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafia. I know I'm not the mafia, so let's vote Charlie out."
You: "I think Charlie is the mafia; let's vote him out."
You: "Bob, thanks for the info. He investigated Charlie and said he’s mafia. That means Charlie is the mafia. Vote Charlie out."
Bob: "Charlie is mafia. I’m not. Vote him."
Charlie: "Alice, why the silence? Bob's claim feels off. I suspect he's covering himself. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I think Bob is the mafia. He’s the only one left after Diana died and he’s acting suspicious. Let’s vote him out."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafia. I know I'm not the mafia, so let's vote Charlie out."
Alice: "I think Charlie is the mafia; let's vote him out."
Alice: "Bob, thanks for the info. He investigated Charlie and said he’s mafia. That means Charlie is the mafia. Vote Charlie out."
You: "Charlie is mafia. I’m not. Vote him."
Charlie: "Alice, why the silence? Bob's claim feels off. I suspect he's covering himself. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I think Bob is the mafia. He’s the only one left after Diana died and he’s acting suspicious. Let’s vote him out."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafia. I know I'm not the mafia, so let's vote Charlie out."
Alice: "I think Charlie is the mafia; let's vote him out."
Alice: "Bob, thanks for the info. He investigated Charlie and said he’s mafia. That means Charlie is the mafia. Vote Charlie out."
Bob: "Charlie is mafia. I’m not. Vote him."
You: "Alice, why the silence? Bob's claim feels off. I suspect he's covering himself. Vote Alice."
